document.heading: Council Cable Autonomy and Control Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-174, the “Council Cable Autonomy and Control Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-494, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 2, 2010, and March 16, 2010, respectively. Approved without the signature of the Mayor on April 6, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-371 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-174 became effective on May 27, 2010.
